title: CI migration
shortDescription: Migrate CI/CD pipelines across platforms at scale
description: Migrate CI/CD pipelines from one platform to another across your entire codebase. Ona converts pipeline configurations, updates secrets references, and validates the migration.

trigger.label: Manual trigger or scheduled
trigger.details: Runs across all repositories with CI configuration

benefits: Migrate hundreds of pipelines in parallel

steps.title: Manual trigger
steps.content: Select source platform (GitLab CI, Jenkins, CircleCI) and target platform (GitHub Actions)

steps.title: Analyze existing pipelines
steps.content: Scan all repositories for CI configuration files. Identify pipeline stages, jobs, dependencies, and secrets used.

steps.title: Convert pipeline syntax
steps.content: Transform pipeline configuration to target platform format. Map equivalent actions, runners, and caching strategies.

steps.title: Validate configuration
steps.content: Run syntax validation on generated pipeline files. Check for missing secrets or unsupported features.

steps.title: Create migration PRs
steps.content: Create pull requests with new CI configuration. Include migration notes and rollback instructions.

title: Java/COBOL migration
shortDescription: Modernize legacy COBOL or Java to modern languages
description: Modernize legacy COBOL or Java applications by converting them to modern languages and frameworks. Ona understands business logic and preserves functionality.

steps.title: Select migration scope
steps.content: Choose source files or modules to migrate. Define target language (Java, TypeScript, Python) and framework.

steps.title: Analyze legacy code
steps.content: Parse COBOL/legacy Java code structure. Identify data structures, business rules, and external dependencies.

steps.title: Generate modern equivalent
steps.content: Create equivalent code in target language. Maintain same inputs, outputs, and business logic.

steps.title: Create test suite
steps.content: Generate comprehensive tests comparing legacy and modern implementations. Ensure functional parity.

steps.title: Run validation tests
steps.content: Execute test suite against both implementations. Report any behavioral differences.

steps.title: Create migration PR
steps.content: Submit pull request with migrated code, tests, and documentation. Include migration guide.

title: COBOL spec identification
shortDescription: Extract business specs from legacy COBOL code
description: Analyze COBOL codebases to extract and document business specifications. Ona reads legacy code and produces human-readable documentation of what the system does.
benefits: Extract business rules from legacy code

steps.title: Select COBOL sources
steps.content: Choose COBOL programs, copybooks, and JCL to analyze.

steps.title: Parse code structure
steps.content: Analyze COBOL divisions, sections, and paragraphs. Map data definitions and file structures.

steps.title: Extract business logic
steps.content: Identify business rules, calculations, and decision trees. Document conditional logic and data transformations.

steps.title: Generate specifications
steps.content: Create structured specification documents. Include data dictionaries, process flows, and business rule catalogs.

steps.title: Create documentation PR
steps.content: Submit pull request with generated specifications. Organize by program, module, or business domain.

title: Code review
shortDescription: Automated PR review for quality and security
description: Automatically review every pull request for code quality, security vulnerabilities, and adherence to team standards. Ona provides actionable feedback before human review.

trigger.label: Pull request opened or updated
trigger.details: Runs on every PR across configured repositories

steps.title: PR opened
steps.content: Triggered when a pull request is opened or new commits are pushed.

steps.title: Analyze code changes
steps.content: Review diff for code quality, patterns, and potential bugs. Check against team coding standards.

steps.title: Security scan
steps.content: Check for security vulnerabilities, hardcoded secrets, and unsafe patterns.

steps.title: Generate review comments
steps.content: Create inline comments for issues found. Prioritize by severity and provide fix suggestions.

steps.title: Post review
steps.content: Submit review comments to the pull request. Approve, request changes, or comment based on findings.

title: CVE remediation
shortDescription: Detect and fix security vulnerabilities at scale
description: Automatically detect and fix security vulnerabilities across your entire codebase. Ona patches dependencies, migrates breaking changes, and validates fixes with tests.

steps.title: Scheduled scan
steps.content: Daily scan at 2:00 AM UTC. Checks all repositories for known CVEs.

steps.title: Scan dependencies
steps.content: Run security scanners (npm audit, Snyk, Dependabot) across all repositories. Collect vulnerability reports.

steps.title: Analyze vulnerabilities
steps.content: Prioritize CVEs by severity and exploitability. Identify safe upgrade paths and breaking changes.

steps.title: Apply fixes
steps.content: Update vulnerable dependencies. Migrate code for breaking API changes. Update lock files.

steps.title: Run tests
steps.content: Execute full test suite to validate fixes. Report any test failures.

steps.title: Create remediation PRs
steps.content: Submit pull requests for each repository with fixes. Include CVE details and changelog.
